name: first gaem
description:
game i made for learning purpose and to make ppl angy

you play as a little green cube that has to dodge the reb obstacles

some different colored bricks do different things and they don't always follow the same rules (mainly because I wanted to troll my friends)

right now there's 13 levels, but no way of telling which level you're on, because me dumb

there's also no way to close the app unless you play in windowed mode or use the windows key

again, this is just a game made for my own learning purposes, so it's not that great

i added bonk noise
